title: KOMBAT
body_text:
DODGEBALL DRAFT #3 at CXX-SIX
Nominated for a prestigious
Gold Award
, the team formation method known as the
Dodgeball Draft
returns at the 126th extravaganza. Though it is rarely relied on, still its impact can be felt in more ways than one.
At the inaugural draft, teams vied for the top position in a war that seemingly went unresolved. Despite the random squad set-ups, the score at the conclusion of
DODGEBALL 101
was to some a surprising 4-4 tie.
But then came the ever-so violent
"Masterpierce of Mayhem"
, DODGEBALL 108, two measly months later - and my goodness, how lives were forever shortened because of it. This sophomore draft, combined with the
BoxBall
stipulation, produced anguish beyond measure .. John Tronolone's lip busted wide open, Lauren Stopa's ear wacked by bulletballs on three seperate occasions, and countless other battle blows yielded quite possibly the most satanic melee of all-time.
What can the warriors of
EastCoastDodgeball
expect this time around? Will it be the final score remembered most or another vicious display of human brutalization?
This is the 126th - be there February 16, 2008.
body_html:
DODGEBALL DRAFT #3 at CXX-SIX
Nominated for a prestigious Gold Award, the team formation method known as the Dodgeball Draft returns at the 126th extravaganza. Though it is rarely relied on, still its impact can be felt in more ways than one.

At the inaugural draft, teams vied for the top position in a war that seemingly went unresolved. Despite the random squad set-ups, the score at the conclusion of DODGEBALL 101 was to some a surprising 4-4 tie.

But then came the ever-so violent "Masterpierce of Mayhem", DODGEBALL 108, two measly months later - and my goodness, how lives were forever shortened because of it. This sophomore draft, combined with the BoxBall stipulation, produced anguish beyond measure .. John Tronolone's lip busted wide open, Lauren Stopa's ear wacked by bulletballs on three seperate occasions, and countless other battle blows yielded quite possibly the most satanic melee of all-time.

What can the warriors of EastCoastDodgeball expect this time around? Will it be the final score remembered most or another vicious display of human brutalization?

This is the 126th - be there February 16, 2008.
